treatment-md.title: Laemostenus (Antisphodrus) shirazensis Tahami, Muilwijk, Lohaj & Sadeghi, 2017, sp. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: Study of Laemostenus species across Zagros and Central zone of Iran, with the description of seven new cavernicolous species and notes on subgenus Iranosphodrus (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Sphodrini)
